Close.explanation: Target variable and primary feature - closing stock price for each day
Close.evidence: Used in nearly all financial time series prediction models as primary signal

EMA20.explanation: 20-day exponential moving average - captures short-term price trend
EMA20.evidence: Commonly used in financial forecasting models as a signal smoother

Return_1D.evidence: Multiple academic studies show returns are more predictive than absolute prices

Return_5D.evidence: Momentum effects are well-documented in financial markets

Volatility_20D.evidence: Strong evidence that volatility regimes affect price prediction accuracy

EMA50.explanation: 50-day exponential moving average - captures medium-term price trend
EMA50.evidence: Widely used to identify medium-term trend direction

MACD_line.explanation: MACD line (12-ema minus 26-ema) - momentum and trend direction
MACD_line.evidence: Core technical indicator for trend following strategies

MACD_signal.explanation: Signal line (9-day ema of macd line) - smoother version for trigger signals
